de.lessvoid.niftyinternal.math

Class Vec2

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.lessvoid.niftyinternal.math.Vec2
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class Vec2
extends Object
implements Serializable
    Holds a 2-tuple vector.
    Author:
    cix_foo , void256 - removed the interfaces this class implements and remove the base class to make that a simple and plain self-contained class
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
